articles.author: James McCarten
articles.title: Canada-US land border reopening: What you should know - CTV News
articles.description: The southbound lanes on the road to North America's post-pandemic recovery will finally reopen Monday as the United States ends nearly 20 months of controversial COVID-19 exile and allows fully vaccinated travellers to cross the Canada-U.S. land border.
articles.content:

articles.title: Priyanka Chopra dances with American-Indian stars at Lilly Singh's post-Diwali party - India Today
articles.description: Priyanka Chopra attended Lilly Singh's post-Diwali party with their American Indian friends. They danced to some upbeat Punjabi numbers at the party.

articles.title: Nicaragua may be holding presidential elections, but it is edging toward dictatorship - NPR
articles.description: Nicaraguan President Daniel Ortega is running for a fourth consecutive term to remain leader of the Central American country in elections that critics and U.S. officials have labeled a "sham."
articles.content:
Nicaragua's President Daniel Ortega and his wife, Vice President Rosario Murillo, lead a rally in the capital Managua in 2018.

articles.title: American arrested at airport for cracking bomb joke - The Star Online
articles.description: An American was arrested in Tuguegarao for making a bomb joke, according to a Facebook post by the Cagayan provincial government.
articles.content:
MANILA (Philippine Daily Inquirer/ANN): An American man was arrested in Tuguegarao on Friday (Nov 5) for making a bomb joke, according to a Facebook post by the Cagayan provincial government.
